def_en: Earthly means happening in the material world of our life on earth and not in any spiritual life or life after death.

def_cn: （用于no earthly reason等短语中表示强调）根本，绝对
def_en: Earthly is used for emphasis in phrases such as no earthly reason. If you say that there is no earthly reason why something should happen, you are emphasizing that there is no reason at all why it should happen.
